Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data

Class BookDataManager

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data.BookDataManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataManager
public class BookDataManager extends Object implements DataManager
Manages loading and storing book data from/to a text file.

    • loadData

      public void loadData(Library library) throws IOException, LibraryException
      Loads book data from a file and adds them to the library.
      Specified by:
      loadData in interface DataManager
      Parameters:
      library - The library to which the books will be added.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an IO error occurs.
      LibraryException - If a parsing or data consistency error occurs.

    • parseLoanId

      private int parseLoanId(String[] properties, int bookId)
      Parses the loan ID from book data properties.
      Parameters:
      properties - The split data line from the file.
      bookId - The book ID for error reporting.
      Returns:
      The parsed loan ID or -1 if not present or invalid.

      Specified by:
      storeData in interface DataManager
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - If an IO error occurs.
